## PointerControllerOptions interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PointerControllerOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [far?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.far.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Length of laser pointer. Default is 5. |
|  [firstPersonOnlyLayer?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.firstpersononlylayer.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ [Layer number](https://threejs.org/docs/#api/en/core/Layers) to be displayed only for first-person camera. (Layer numbers that you do not want displayed on mirrors, etc.) |
|  [getCollisionObjects?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.getcollisionobjects.md) |  | () =&gt; THREE.Object3D\[\] \| undefined | _(Optional)_ Get a list of objects that the laser pointer will not penetrate. |
|  [getInteractableObjects?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.getinteractableobjects.md) |  | () =&gt; THREE.Object3D\[\] \| undefined | _(Optional)_ Get a list of objects that can interact with a laser pointer (Other than teleport destination). |
|  [getTeleportTargetObjects?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.getteleporttargetobjects.md) |  | () =&gt; THREE.Object3D\[\] \| undefined | _(Optional)_ Get a list of objects that can be the destination of a teleport. |
|  [intervalSec?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.intervalsec.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Processing frequency of tick(). Default is 1 / 30 (30fps). |
|  [onCursorHover?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.oncursorhover.md) |  | (el: THREE.Object3D) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ Cursor hover event handler. like [mouseover](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseover_event)<!-- -->. |
|  [onCursorLeave?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.oncursorleave.md) |  | (el: THREE.Object3D) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ Cursor leave event handler. like [mouseleave](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseleave_event)<!-- -->. |
|  [onSelectDown?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.onselectdown.md) |  | (el: THREE.Object3D, point: THREE.Vector3) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ Select button press event handler. like [mousedown](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mousedown_event)<!-- -->. |
|  [onSelectUp?](./three-xr-controller.pointercontrolleroptions.onselectup.md) |  | (el: THREE.Object3D, point: THREE.Vector3) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ Select button release event handler. like [mouseup](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseup_event)<!-- -->. |
